content:
In #12947 I made a small start at using the new since syntax in @[deprecated].

This will make it easier to automate processing of deprecated declarations.

This is only a small start. If anyone else is tempted to help out with this chore, I'd be happy to either have pushes to this PR, or I'll hit merge on anything you send my way!

I commented on the PR: I have two in-flight PRs that work towards this (and a big branch with more work: branch#MR-deprecation-dates-all, mostly adding missing dates). Help chopping that into PRs is welcome!
(That PR will need updating to the "since" syntax, but that shouldn't be too hard.)
I hit on the first.

... it accrued a merge conflict now; I've merge master and will re-bors once this comes back.
#12408 is another PR adding a few deprecation dates
